summary: Provides a PyTorch implementation of a BiPointNet-inspired architecture for classifying 3D point cloud data, incorporating custom one‑dimensional convolution, an exponential moving average max‑pooling layer, and a learned spatial transformation module to process and infer class labels from raw point coordinates.
business_intent: Serves as a reference model for developers and researchers building 3D perception solutions such as autonomous vehicle perception, robotics navigation, or AR/VR content understanding, enabling rapid prototyping and experimentation with point‑cloud classification pipelines.
